_comment: World Generation Configuration - Controls infinite world generation parameters

_documentation.overview: This file controls how the infinite world generates chunks, biomes, resources, and dungeons.
_documentation.biome_system: Uses deterministic noise to create organic biome clusters. The same seed always generates the same world.
_documentation.danger_zones: The world is divided into zones based on distance from spawn. Each zone has different danger levels.
_documentation.resource_spawning: Resources spawn based on chunk danger level and biome type.
customization_tips: Increase biome_noise_scale for larger biome regions
Adjust danger_zone_radius to control safe starting area
Modify resource_counts to make the world more or less resource-rich
Set dungeon_spawn_chance higher for more dungeon-focused gameplay

chunk_loading._comment: Controls how many chunks are loaded around the player
chunk_loading.load_radius_description: Chunks loaded in each direction from player (4 = 9x9 grid = 81 chunks)
chunk_loading.spawn_always_loaded_description: Spawn area chunks that stay loaded even when player is far away
chunk_loading.chunk_size_description: Tiles per chunk side (16 = 256 tiles per chunk). Changing this requires world regeneration.

biome_distribution._comment: Percentage of each biome type. Must sum to 1.0 (100%)
biome_distribution.cave_description: Caves and quarries with ores and stones - 40% default

biome_clustering._comment: Controls how biomes group together. Higher values = larger contiguous regions
biome_clustering.biome_noise_scale_description: Base scale for biome boundaries. Range: 2.0 (small clusters) to 10.0 (massive regions)
biome_clustering.biome_noise_octaves_description: Noise complexity layers. More octaves = more detailed boundaries
biome_clustering.danger_noise_scale_description: Scale for danger level variation within zones

danger_zones._comment: Controls how danger increases with distance from spawn. Uses chunk distance (not tile distance).
danger_zones.safe_zone_radius_description: Chunks from spawn that are always peaceful (no dangerous/rare chunks)
danger_zones.transition_zone_radius_description: Chunks where danger gradually increases. Beyond this, danger is at maximum levels.
danger_zones.max_danger_enabled_description: If true, danger caps at transition_zone_radius. If false, continues scaling forever.

safe_zone_distribution._comment: Danger distribution within safe zone (0 to safe_zone_radius chunks)

transition_zone_distribution._comment: Danger distribution in transition zone (safe_zone_radius to transition_zone_radius)

outer_zone_distribution._comment: Danger distribution beyond transition zone (full difficulty)

spawn_area._comment: Controls the safe starting area around world origin (0,0)
spawn_area.resource_exclusion_description: Tiles from origin where no resources spawn (keeps spawn area clear)

crafting_station_area.description: Fixed crafting stations spawn north of origin

resource_spawning._comment: Controls how many resources spawn per chunk based on danger level

cursed_swamp.description: Cursed swamps have higher tier fishing

water_subtypes.cursed_swamp_note: Cursed swamps only appear in rare danger zones

dungeon_spawning.spawn_chance_description: Probability of dungeon in eligible chunk (~8% = roughly 1 per 12 chunks)
dungeon_spawning.min_distance_description: Minimum chunk distance from origin for dungeons

chunk_unloading._comment: Controls chunk memory management for infinite worlds
chunk_unloading.save_modified_description: Save chunks with harvested resources to separate files
chunk_unloading.track_unload_description: Track when chunks unload for resource respawn calculations
